content: materials weight 6 yarn i used bernat blanket yarn in the colors race car red go go green pixie pink and vanilla i used less than an entire skein for each color there should be enough left over to make a second strawberry from the same skeins 10 00mm crochet hook scissors small cute and sharp stitch markers love these because they are secure and won t fall out of your work darning needle my faves stitches + abbreviations chain = chain single_crochet = single_crochet st s = stitch es repeat = repeat increase = increase decrease = decrease blo back loop only flo = front loop only
